transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, yes good evening. Tesna is speaking. Am I talking to Matt Engineer?
Customer: Haanji madam.
Executive: Ji, I am speaking from IndiaMART, from the accounting department.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Ji, the number you gave yesterday, we couldn't coordinate on that, ma'am. And sir, it's necessary to talk to him. Are you not using the services?
Customer: Haan, ek second madam, main baat karti hu na. Ek second, main add kar lu kya?
Executive: Haan, you can conference too, no issue.
Customer: Theek hai madam, aap hold kijiye, main unko kar deti hu add na. Haan haan, please please.
(silence)
The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahein.
The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Haanji madam, add kar diya unko na, ab baat kar lijiye. Haanji sir.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yes, ma'am. Ji, good evening sir. Sir, haanji, aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Ji, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu, Matt Engineer, right?
Customer: Ji ma'am.
Executive: Ji, sir, you have a request open here, sir. You are not receiving calls on your number, the one ending in 885.
Customer: Kya hai sir?
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Kyunki mere paas call nahi aayi, isme to mera number bhi hai.
Executive: Kaunsa?
Customer: Ye 9680 wala number nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi, jo 885 wala number hai na, us pe hum log kal se aapse coordinate karne ka try kar rahe hain, but aapse baat nahi ho pa rahi hai, kyunki aapka yaha par request open hui hai sir.
Customer: Kya sir?
Customer: Ma'am, ye to number hai lekin mere paas to call to nahi receive ho rahi.
Executive: Call nahi aa rahi hai? Ringing to ho rahi hai, aur phir main is number se call kar rahi hu agar us pe nahi connect ho pa rahi hai. Sir, main aapko bata deti hu, aapki request open hui hai, aap buylead aur call nahi receive kar pa rahe hain, matlab kya issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Ma'am, aati nahi hai aur buylead abhi tak koi dikh nahi rahi hai.
Executive: Nahi aa rahi hai, aapka ye issue hai. Kyunki weekend team ki side se aapke aaj request open, aaj nahi balki 26th kal hi request open ho gayi thi, to isliye kal se hi call karne ka try kiya ja raha hai aapko. But aapse baat nahi hui, ma'am se baat hui to ma'am ne dusra number bhi diya aapka, seven karke koi number hai.
Customer: To usme meri baat nahi hui.
Customer: Ma'am, mere paas to call to receive nahi hui.
Executive: Ek kaam karo, aap ye wala number add kar dijiye na aap.
Customer: Kaunsa? 77 wala. Yahi jo abhi, ye jo aapko kal diya tha na, abhi maine usi pe baat ki hai to usse baat ho hi rahi hai. Aur kal bhi aapka nahi laga tha.
Executive: Mere paas to add karne ka number wo mere paas authorize nahi hai number add karne ka isliye.
Executive: Aap mera hata ke inka ye wala rakh dijiye.
Customer: Haan, to sir kar sakte hain, setting mein ja kar ke PNS call setting ka option aata hai.
Customer: Ma'am, kitne, ma'am kitne phone connect kar sakte hain isme?
Executive: Usme kitne number connect kar sakte hain?
Customer: Haanji. Haan.
Executive: Aap usme paanch number add kar sakte hain. Agar ma'am ka bhi rahega to bhi problem nahi hai. Buyer, buyer ki call aayegi, bas ma'am ko receive karni rahengi aur aapko forward karni rahengi, bas agar ma'am ko nahi idea hai product ke bare mein to.
Customer: Lekin ma'am, main isme dekh raha hu abhi lead to nahi dikha raha mujhe kahin bhi.
Executive: Lead nahi aa rahi hai? Kis company chahiye?
Executive: Ye powder flame spray gun ki aayi hai, Ahmedabad, Gujarat se. Aur aap ek baar check kariye.
Customer: Ma'am, lekin main abhi ye wo khol raha hu na, mujhe kahin nahi dikh rahi wo to main.
Executive: Main aapko bata rahi hu, aapko search karna rahega. Aap app open karenge na, buylead ka option aayega. Buylead pe click kariye aap. Fir aapko recent ka option aayega.
Customer: Ma'am, buylead pe click kar raha hu na, kuch nahi dikha raha.
Executive: India select karein, India.
Customer: India select kiya.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: India select kiya. You cannot find any relevant buylead. For you, please try removing filters, ye likh kar aa raha hai.
Executive: Sir, waha par aapko search karne ka option aa raha hai, powder flame spray gun karke?
Customer: Ye maine kara hai to ye message likha hua aa raha hai.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye, main aapko ek baar try karti hu share karne ka.
Executive: Mere paas abhi share karne ka nahi option aa raha hai. Aapko buylead nahi aa rahi hai, aap roz check karte ho aap matlab ki?
Customer: Ma'am, main daily dekhta hu, yahi message aa gaya.
Executive: Achha. Theek hai, ek baar aap ek minute rukiyega.
(silence)
Executive: Wo time lag gaya kya? Main aaj ye main apna accounting ko hi dikha rahi thi.
Customer: Hello? Haan ma'am, main ye laptop pe bhi khol rakha hai aur mobile pe bhi, lekin isme dono mein ye aa raha hai, sorry your current selection, you are unable to show any relevant buylead.
Executive: Theek hai, to piche se kuch issue hoga, sorry aapko. Ek minute, piche se koi issue hoga isliye aapko nahi show ho rahi hai. Main aapko kuch time mein, aapka ye whatsapp number hai na, ye primary number wala?
Customer: Haan, 885 wala.
Executive: Simple, haan, main aapko buylead share kar dungi. Kal agar kal main office aa jati hu to main kal share kar deti hu. Otherwise main phir aapko aaj hi buylead matlab aapka catalog change karke aaj hi share kar deti hu.
Customer: Haan, ye buylead pe ja raha hu, India select hai. Aur isme kuch dikha hi nahi raha, ye wo aa raha hai, sorry your current selection you are unable to show any relevant buylead.
Executive: Otherwise aapko nahi show ho rahi hai na, mujhe show ho rahi hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads or calls.

- Customer unable to see buyleads in the app.

- Customer unable to add new number.



Resolution:

- Executive added the customer on conference call.

- Executive explained how to add numbers in settings.

- Executive offered to share buyleads via WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share buyleads via WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, calls, app, whatsapp, number
